critique: The document expresses a preference for plastic straws over paper straws, framing the issue as one of practicality and cost-effectiveness rather than environmental concern. It directs federal agencies to eliminate the procurement of paper straws and develop a national strategy to end their use, indicating a stance against environmental regulations perceived as irrational or ineffective. The document also emphasizes executive authority by directing agencies to implement these changes and revoke a previous executive order promoting sustainability.
